item.title: Leetcode 465 Optimal Account Balancing 解题报告
item.description: Leetcode 465 Optimal Account Balancing 解题报告 题目 (Problem) A group of friends went on holiday and sometimes lent each other money. For example, Alice paid for Bill’s lunch for $10. Then later Chris gave Alice $5 for a taxi ride. We can model each transaction as a tuple (x, y, z) which means person x gave person y $z. Assuming Alice, Bill, and Chris are person
